title: Jennalee Tracy, C.Ht.
author: Jennalee Tracy; C Ht
description: Jennalee discovered hypnosis while earning her B.A. in Psychology and pursued an independent study on bridging the gap between the two schools of thought. She has spent her career working within Integrative Medicine clinics alongside health practitioners and physicians to support their patients in...
cleaned_text: earning her B.A. in Psychology and pursued an independent study on bridging the gap between the two schools of thought. She has spent her career working within Integrative Medicine clinics alongside health practitioners and physicians to support their patients in establishing healthier routines and happier lives. Her passion for mind-body-spiritual well-being lead her to become a yoga instructor, 200-hour certified with the Registered Yoga Alliance, as well as a Chopra Center [Perfect Health](/teach/perfect-health-certification-program) instructor. Jennalee has created a unique approach to self-empowerment by blending the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda with the power of hypnotherapy.
